Formulas describing fish population dynamics

$$
g\left(\mathbf{n}_{s, t}\right)=\mathbf{G}\left(\mathbf{n}_{s, t-1} \circ \exp \left(-\mathbf{m}_{s, t-1}-\mathbf{v} f_{s, t-1}\right)\right)+\mathbf{r}_{s, t}
$$

$$
\mathbf{c}_{s, t}=\frac{\mathbf{v} f_{s, t}}{\mathbf{v} f_{s, t}+\mathbf{m}_{s, t}} \circ\left(1-\exp \left(-\mathbf{m}_{s, t}-\mathbf{v} f_{s, t}\right)\right) \circ \mathbf{n}_{s, t}
$$
